name: Chinese Chess．
description:
Chinese Chess is one of the most popular chess games included Classic Chinese Chess! Play Chinese Chess that require skill, strategy and patience to win! A true brain training experience!

Different from other Chinese Chess, we bring you powerful AI robot include machine learning that make the game much more challenge.

Features:
- Four different levels AI robot
- Man vs Man mode
- Great user playing experience
- Timer
- GameCenter supported

Chinese Chess has never been more fun! Any questions, please leave some feedback. azhuona@gmail.com
